reviewText: The video quality is so so but I recognize this is neither a recent video nor made under recent technology standards (e.g. HD).  Of course if someone has the originally film footage (and someone must) and takes the time to digitally convert it using the highest resolution, it would be fantastic and of course more expensive.  Since I love Shu Qi, I would still pay for such an item - within reason of course.  In fact, I am still hoping to get the Penthouse magazine  in which she appeared!

This Asian beauty and actress, combining the sizzle of Angie Dickinson, of sparkling eyes and captivating smile, is seen in a three-part exposure of her natural, unadorned physicality and it is jaw-dropping. Even with the footage pre-Hong Kong quality with the barest of cosmetics or film production, Shu Qi is spell-bindingly captivating in her natural state or partially-clothed. In the first segment, Shu Qi is shown romping dreamily at sunset moving with the breeze, draping or holding a flimsy garment as she does so to a pop rhythmic score. Although au naturel and captivating, it does not quite improve the poor 16 mm. transfer quality. The jazzy, musical score (a la Oscar Petersen) for the 2nd segment adds significant class to the slowly moving lens of the photographer as he gets unrestricted movement along her natural curves in the privacy of her budoir which adds to this special treat, of seeing a model on the cusp of an acting career with surprising naturalness. In the third segment Shu Qi is paired with other models in a lingerie fashion show which reveals her nascent ability to charm, her flash of smile and eyes while prancing down the runway in the flimsiest nighties, displaying again her acting promise. this time to a disco beat. Many Leonardos and Rembrandts would pay a king's ransom for such private loveliness and this VCD gives the admirer of Shu Qi her private charms with a substantial measure of grace and class.

This is a great showcase for lovely Shu Qi. It is a "pinup" type film, as my boyfriend categorizes his and my movies. Together, we own 2354 selections, including 173 miscellaneous pinups and 90 "Playboy" pinups. In this film, Shu Qi strips and is nude much of the time. There is no clinical nudity as we see in porno, but some scenes are rather revealing. There are three parts in this movie. She is first shown at a beach, and this is the part my boyfriend likes best. Next, she takes a shower and is in a bedroom. The final part has several girls on a runway modeling lingerie. Some have T-backs, and some are transparent. Shu Qi is featured, but the other girls are pretty as well. We have bought several Shu Qi films from the same seller in Singapore, and he is always courteous, prompt and efficient.

This is a DVD I ordered from Singapaore through amazon.com. Service and packaging were excellent on all of my orders to this seller. Shu Qi and I could be related. In China, the surname is first. Her real name is Lin Li-Hui, and my surname is also Lin. She is an inch taller and a few pounds heavier than I am. She has a great figure, and she displays it well nude in this film. She is nude throughout the film, so it is difficult to choose favorite scenes. One video says she is about 5'-6.2", 110 lbs., 34"/24"/35". That is fairly big among Chinese girls. She has a shapely figure and also has a sexy face, so she is one of the most attractive Chinese actresses in current movies. Chao Kar-Ling rivals her, but Miss Chao has never appeared nude to my knowledge. In 1970s to mid-1980s Chinese movies, Tsen Shu-Yi was sexiest, and Shao Yin-Yin and Lin Yang-Yang were next. Li Li-Li was most beautiful. In 1985-2000 or so Chinese movies, Wang Tsu-Hsien is most beautiful, and Yao Hsuk-Ching is quite sexy. Shu Qi does not suffer by comparison with these past stars!

This forty-minute montage features the lovely Shu Qi exhibiting her heavenly form in various settings. The first shoot takes place seaside, where she poses nude and seminude. In the next segment she models outdoors in lingerie. Cut to a bathroom, in which she strips, showers, and then bathes. She poses in lingerie some more and in a bedroom lies nude on a bed. The final sequence occurs on a catwalk, where she and other models strut their stuff in scanty undergarments. A mixed soundtrack plays all the while, from start to finish.

The nudity is very mild though gratifying to see, given Shu Qi's incredibly graceful curves and delectably long legs, among her other assets. For those who care to know, there is one instance when she is sitting on the sand and the camera slowly zooms in between her legs, giving the viewer a peek at her vulva. But in this video she is equally alluring, if not more so, when scantily clothed. On the catwalk, for instance, she really dazzles parading in her lingerie, especially when she sashays away from the camera, her glorious buns wiggling assuredly.

This was shot on video in full frame. The picture is grainy and lacks definition; colors are lackluster. The audio, which consists of music ranging in style from light melodies to hypnotic rhythms, varies in quality from track to track, passable at its best, muddy at its worst. Hopefully this video footage will one day be cleaned up and rereleased, but for now we'll have to take what's available of this striking beauty.

Nothing more than a DVD show casing Shu Qi's naked body. I loved it! I know she can be seen naked elsewhere but in this one DVD you'll see her naked, totally naked over and over again.

If that's what you're looking for, I was, this is the DVD for you.
